group.__comment_group_1__: Group always requires correct group_title field (must be unique)
group.__comment_group_2__: Program uses title for lookup, but will ignore other fields, if the group exists.
group.__comment_group_3__: If existing group, delete shortname for sure (any field, but title)

paragraphs.__comment_standalone__: make 'yes' if the group_type == 'ordered' and it is a standalone para
paragraphs.__comment_short_title__: necessary for internal link_text; if blank & subtile len <= 51, will auto copy subtitle
